manifest:
builder:
  track: dev

labels:
  app-group: estafette-ci
  team: estafette-team
  language: helm

version:
  semver:
    major: 1
    minor: 0
    patch: 0
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}-{{auto}}'
    releaseBranch: 1.0.0

stages:
  lint-and-package:
    parallelStages:
      lint-helm-chart:
        image: extensions/helm:dev
        action: lint

      package-helm-chart:
        image: extensions/helm:dev
        action: package

  test-helm-chart:
    services:
    - name: kubernetes
      image: bsycorp/kind:latest-1.12
      readiness:
        path: /kubernetes-ready
        port: 10080
    image: extensions/helm:dev
    action: test
    values: |-
      cockroachdb:
        replicaCount: 1
        storage: "1Gi"
        secret:
          valuesAreBase64Encoded: true
          # generated with
          # > openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 1024 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certificate.key -out certificate.crt
          # > cat certificate.crt certificate.key | base64
          certificatePemFile: 
          # > cat certificate.key | base64
          certificateKeyFile: 

      estafette-ci-api:
        replicaCount: 1
        jobs:
          namespace: estafette-ci-jobs
        secret:
          valuesAreBase64Encoded: true
          decryptionKey: MVBzdlhWT01raGZBUXVCSWNJR0N0eklkUFhOVjBOWUcK
          # generated with
          # > openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 1024 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certificate.key -out certificate.crt
          # > cat certificate.crt certificate.key | base64
          certificatePemFile: 
          # > cat certificate.key | base64
          certificateKeyFile: 

      estafette-ci-web:
        replicaCount: 1
        secret:
          valuesAreBase64Encoded: true
          # generated with
          # > openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 1024 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certificate.key -out certificate.crt
          # > cat certificate.crt certificate.key | base64
          certificatePemFile: 
          # > cat certificate.key | base64
          certificateKeyFile: 

      estafette-ci-cron-event-sender:
        secret:
          apiKey: abc
        cronEventUrl: https://httpstat.us/200

      jobs:
        namespace: estafette-ci-jobs
      secret:
        valuesAreBase64Encoded: true
        decryptionKey: MVBzdlhWT01raGZBUXVCSWNJR0N0eklkUFhOVjBOWUcK
        # generated with
        # > openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 1024 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certificate.key -out certificate.crt
        # > cat certificate.crt certificate.key | base64
        certificatePemFile: 
        # > cat certificate.key | base64
        certificateKeyFile: 

  clone-charts-repo:
    image: extensions/git-clone:dev
    repo: helm-charts
    branch: master

  publish-helm-chart:
    image: extensions/helm:dev
    action: publish

  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    workspace: estafette
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    when:
      status == 'succeeded' ||
      status == 'failed'

releases:
  release:
    stages:
      clone-charts-repo:
        image: extensions/git-clone:dev
        repo: helm-charts
        branch: master

      purge-prerelease-helm-charts:
        image: extensions/helm:dev
        action: purge

      create-github-release:
        image: extensions/github-release:dev

  helm-diff:
    stages:
      diff:
        image: extensions/helm:dev
        credentials: gke-tooling
        action: diff
        tillerless: true
        namespace: estafette-ci
manifestWithDefaults:
builder:
  track: dev
  os: linux
labels:
  app-group: estafette-ci
  language: helm
  team: estafette-team
version:
  semver:
    major: 1
    minor: 0
    patch: "0"
    labelTemplate: '{{branch}}-{{auto}}'
    releaseBranch: 1.0.0
stages:
  lint-and-package:
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    parallelStages:
    - image: extensions/helm:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      action: lint
    - image: extensions/helm:dev
      shell: /bin/sh
      workDir: /estafette-work
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      action: package
  test-helm-chart:
    image: extensions/helm:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    services:
    - name: kubernetes
      image: bsycorp/kind:latest-1.12
      shell: /bin/sh
      multiStage: false
      when: status == 'succeeded'
      readiness:
        path: /kubernetes-ready
        timeoutSeconds: 60
        port: 10080
        protocol: http
        hostname: kubernetes
    action: test
    values: |-
      cockroachdb:
        replicaCount: 1
        storage: "1Gi"
        secret:
          valuesAreBase64Encoded: true
          # generated with
          # > openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 1024 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certificate.key -out certificate.crt
          # > cat certificate.crt certificate.key | base64
          certificatePemFile: 
          # > cat certificate.key | base64
          certificateKeyFile: 

      estafette-ci-api:
        replicaCount: 1
        jobs:
          namespace: estafette-ci-jobs
        secret:
          valuesAreBase64Encoded: true
          decryptionKey: MVBzdlhWT01raGZBUXVCSWNJR0N0eklkUFhOVjBOWUcK
          # generated with
          # > openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 1024 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certificate.key -out certificate.crt
          # > cat certificate.crt certificate.key | base64
          certificatePemFile: 
          # > cat certificate.key | base64
          certificateKeyFile: 

      estafette-ci-web:
        replicaCount: 1
        secret:
          valuesAreBase64Encoded: true
          # generated with
          # > openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 1024 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certificate.key -out certificate.crt
          # > cat certificate.crt certificate.key | base64
          certificatePemFile: 
          # > cat certificate.key | base64
          certificateKeyFile: 

      estafette-ci-cron-event-sender:
        secret:
          apiKey: abc
        cronEventUrl: https://httpstat.us/200

      jobs:
        namespace: estafette-ci-jobs
      secret:
        valuesAreBase64Encoded: true
        decryptionKey: MVBzdlhWT01raGZBUXVCSWNJR0N0eklkUFhOVjBOWUcK
        # generated with
        # > openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 1024 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout certificate.key -out certificate.crt
        # > cat certificate.crt certificate.key | base64
        certificatePemFile: 
        # > cat certificate.key | base64
        certificateKeyFile: 
  clone-charts-repo:
    image: extensions/git-clone:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    branch: master
    repo: helm-charts
  publish-helm-chart:
    image: extensions/helm:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded'
    action: publish
  slack-notify:
    image: extensions/slack-build-status:dev
    shell: /bin/sh
    workDir: /estafette-work
    when: status == 'succeeded' || status == 'failed'
    channels:
    - '#build-status'
    workspace: estafette
releases:
  release:
    stages:
      clone-charts-repo:
        image: extensions/git-clone:dev
        shell: /bin/sh
        workDir: /estafette-work
        when: status == 'succeeded'
        branch: master
        repo: helm-charts
      purge-prerelease-helm-charts:
        image: extensions/helm:dev
        shell: /bin/sh
        workDir: /estafette-work
        when: status == 'succeeded'
        action: purge
      create-github-release:
        image: extensions/github-release:dev
        shell: /bin/sh
        workDir: /estafette-work
        when: status == 'succeeded'
  helm-diff:
    stages:
      diff:
        image: extensions/helm:dev
        shell: /bin/sh
        workDir: /estafette-work
        when: status == 'succeeded'
        action: diff
        credentials: gke-tooling
        namespace: estafette-ci
        tillerless: true

commits.message: move readiness to service level, loose the ports
